Biography

OVERVIEW

A 50-40-90 type (shooting percentage at or above 50% for field goals, 40% for three-pointers, and 90% for free throws) who can mix it up on the glass

HIGH SCHOOL:

Four-year varsity starter and letter winner at Phoenix's Moon Valley High School

As a senior, averaged 19.2 points and 9.1 rebounds per game while leading Moon Valley to a 23-5 record and Final Four of the 4A state tournament

Named 1st Team All-State by both The Arizona Republic and AIA for 4A Conference after 2016-17 season

Averaged 18.2 points per game during junior season and was named to Division III second team by AIA

Got it done in the classroom as well in high school with a 3.8 grade point average.

Personal: Born in April of 1999...son of Trevor and Susan Thompson.

No stats available for the current season.
